Detailed Description

The Being class is used as a basis for Characters, and NPCs

The Character class is used for storing characters

The Character State is used for choosing a character to play with

The Connect State is used for connecting to a game server

The Game State class is a base class for each state the game may use

This manages all input from the user

The Load State is used for waiting until connection to game server is complete

The Login State is used for logging into the game server

The Options State is used for changing graphics options

The Test State is for testing only For now just output frames per second to log

The Tile class holds the geometry

The Update state is used for downloading content updates
